MAN.TITLE: graph_power

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : a graph_data_structure defining a directed graph.
: graph data structure of the new graph

DESCRIPTION.P: graph_power computes the directed graph g1 which is the kth power of directed 1-graph g. There is an arc between two nodes in g1 if there exists a path between these nodes of length at most k in g. graph_power(g,1) is graph g.
If such a graph does not exist, an empty vector is returned.
